# Satya Nadella’s Post

[!\[\]()](https://www.linkedin.com/in/satyanadella?trk=public_post_feed-actor-image)

[Satya Nadella](https://www.linkedin.com/in/satyanadella?trk=public_post_feed-actor-name)

Satya Nadella is an Influencer

Chairman and CEO at Microsoft

3h

Edited

- [Report this post](/uas/login?session_redirect=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.linkedin.com%2Fposts%2Fsatyanadella_5-prompts-to-supercharge-your-everyday-workflow-activity-7369816504252420097-2JtC&trk=public_post_ellipsis-menu-semaphore-sign-in-redirect&guestReportContentType=POST&_f=guest-reporting)

Last week I shared some prompts to show the power of Microsoft 365 Copilot and GPT-5, when it's grounded on your work data, and asked for your own.

Loved the responses from customers and colleagues, and wanted to share some of my favorites:

• "I need to respond to this email. Please read it, summarize the key points, and then ask me one question at a time to help craft a reply that matches my tone and intent" (H/T [Ryan Roslansky](https://www.linkedin.com/in/ryanroslansky?trk=public_post-text) - I've been using this one all the time with Copilot Chat in Outlook)

• "Generate a 20-question quiz to help digest information from [meeting name]"

• "Highlight emerging opportunities for impact, both within my organization and through cross-team or cross-discipline collaboration that would further advance our company’s mission and purpose"

• "Review potential risk in my project, [project name]"

• "Help me write about the impact I delivered from [date] until [date]. This should showcase: my key individual accomplishments that contribute to team, business, or customer results; my contributions to the success of others; my results that build on the work, ideas or effort of others"

[!\[\]()](https://www.linkedin.com/in/satyanadella?trk=public_post_reshare_feed-actor-image)

[Satya Nadella](https://www.linkedin.com/in/satyanadella?trk=public_post_reshare_feed-actor-name)

Satya Nadella is an Influencer

Chairman and CEO at Microsoft

1w

It’s been a few weeks since we brought GPT-5 to Microsoft 365 Copilot, and it’s quickly become part of my everyday workflow, adding a new layer of intelligence spanning all my apps.

Here are 5 prompts that show what’s now possible:

These prompts show exactly why grounding AI in your own work data is so powerful it shifts from generic help to context-aware support. I see the same with marketing: tools like Nyra AI ([https://www.getnyra.ai](https://www.getnyra.ai?trk=public_post_comment-text)/) personalize ad execution around your brand’s data, so every campaign feels aligned instead of automated.
